column1: What is the most important animal in your country? Why is the animal important?
column3:
Many animals like tiger, cow, dog, and cat have an importance in the various aspects like as keeping guard over night and cultivating the soil, not to mention keeping the ecosystem.  Despite that, if I should choose one animal among them, dogs are the most significant in my country, Korea in terms of emotional development of children and dogs’ faithfulness. 

First of all, dogs are really helpful for the emotional development of children. That is, in the recent Korean society, parents are too busy for their work to take care for children and finally likely to make children selfish and rarely realizing the importance of sincere attention toward others.  In the case that children spend time with dogs while parents are not with them, however, they learn the spirit to consider others from dogs with giving a love to them like feeding, washing, wearing them.  Actually, one survey reported that Korean children grow up to the generous and mild character after living with dogs.

Moreover, dogs are faithful and give a lesson to many Korean people.  There is the famous saying in Korea like “The faithfulness of dogs is better than people.”  As this saying means, they are extremely subordinate to their master and even if they are thrown a few miles away, they desperately come back to their master even without eating anything.  Actually, one dog called as “Jin-do” is the representative dog of Korea, a symbol of faithfulness.  Therefore, dogs’ unchangeable love and trust to their master give many Koreans to a meaningful lesson like as the trust among people. 

Accordingly, dogs are considered as the most important animal in Korea.  Than any other animal, they more contribute to the formation of the good character like considering others and the demonstrator for the faithfulness among people.

column1: It has been said. "Not everything that is learned is contained in books." Compare and contrast knowledge gained from experience with knowledge gained from books. In your opinion, which source is more important? Why?
column3:
There is a saying "Nothing outlives book." Since the creation of letters, people have started to record mysterious happenings, marvelous things, religious beliefs, historical events etc., in books. In this vantage point, books are not but  sums of human knowledge gained and experienced by people from ancient times to these days. However, knowledge and experiences in books have been ceaselessly refined and finally lost its crudity. As a result, knowledge gained from books are likely to be more abstract and indirect than knowledge gained from experience. 

       When we learn something by experience, it means that we happen to get a lesson about it by using our own body and soul. In contrast, when we learn something in books, it means we happen to know that by using only our brain. This is a great difference. For example, we can easily find books which say touching a burning pot could hurt you. However this kind of warning doesn't make good effects because it is very abstract. On the contrary, if a person who happen to touch a burning pot by mistake, easily learns it is very dangerous to get closer to hot objects. Moreover he will memorize it for a long time. Therefore knowledge learned by experience is more realistic. 

       In addition, knowledge in books is apt to be biased. Knowledge and information in books are tend to reflect their writer's point of view. It is not surprising to find various history books which witness the same historical event but show great different perspectives. Writers can deftly manipulate knowledge by hiding some or over-emphasizing a fact or another. This kind of cheating is easily overlooked by readers who are prone to believe that writers tell the truth. On the other hand, knowledge learned by experience is more direct. so there is no loophole for manipulation. For example, reports by press on damage or death toll for wars or disasters are often less precise than those by witness who experience the events in the place. 

       In my opinion, knowledge gained from books provide us basic and broad back ground information, But knowledge gained from experience give us more realistic and direct ideas for affairs. Therefore, I think knowledge learned by experience is more important and precious. Even though, knowledge in books seems to be better arranged and selected, we also have to listen carefully to vivid and living lessons of experience.

column1: A company has announced that it weshed to build a large factory near you communiry. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this new influence on your community. Do you support or oppowe the factory? Explain your position.
column3:
If a company were to announce that it wished to establish a big factory in my commmunity, I think I would have mixed emotions because there are advantage and disadvantage to building a factory, especially in a medium-sized town like mine. However, I think disadvantage affects to my town much more than advantage does in repect of pollution. 
     
     
     The main benefit of a new factory is obvious: increased jobs. During IMF, some TV program I was used to enjoying introduced one city experiencing some changes after a factory established in it. Before a factory entered, many of the heads of the families in the city were not able to get jobs because of 'System-Control' of the government. So many families underwent financial straits, and mood at home was heavy. Some of patriarches tried to deal with their mind as drinking, and fights were often occur on the street or at home. However, after building a factory, many jobless persons could get jobs and work on it. Families were released from financial pressure more and more and the atmosphere at home became warm. Also patriarches were not drinkers at all. All of the good changes originated from a new factory. 
     
    However, there is another concern about building a new company : pollution.   My city has many lakes and streams. I would want to know if they would be affected. Could you remember the happening 'itai-itai disease' in Japan from 1955 to 1957? The people in Doyama in Japan, especially old women, realized that their legs more and more bent into the inside. With getting worse the symptoms, they walked with faltering steps like a duck, ultimately, they went died on a bed with crying 'itai,itai'(It means I'm very sick)  Do you know the reason of that?? It was 'cadmium' drained by the factory nearby the river in town. Cadmium overflowed by the plant streamed and entered the river in town and the persons were affected while they didn't perceive. Finally, the factory destroyed the town. I don't never want to happen something like this in my community. 
     

      In conclusion, a big factory could give my community both advantage and disadvantage ; job and pollution. However, now most of the people in my community have jobs, so important thing is preserving natural environment in my community. Therefore, I opposes that a big factory should be established in my community.

column1: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? People should read only those books that are about real events, real people, and established facts.
column3:
There are two worlds: the world which is, and the world which might be. Nonfiction deals with the former, which is happening and happened, and fiction deals with the later, which the writer create. some people think they should read only those books that are about real events, real people, and established facts. But from once upon a time, we have read fiction such as detective novel, science novel . There is no reason to restrict our reading to nonfiction such as real events, real people, and established facts. In my case I voice a counterargument that people should read fiction too because reading a fiction make us to be imaginative and is one way of a rest in order to get out of  stresses.   

First of all,  reading a fiction  make us to be imaginative in our life. When we were children, we enjoyed reading novels such as fantasy novel, detective novel and watching an exciting cartoon on TV. Because some sort of fiction make an effect on our dream, we dream of pilot,  president, a detective , scientist and so on.  As you see, the imagination play an important role as motive power which our dream come true. For example, after I read Gullivers’ travel written by Jonathan swift, for long time a deep impression and excitation didn’t disappear. Whenever possible I dream of the adventure and oversea travel, So far I traveled several countries such as Austrailia, America, India, Nepal, Thailand, Japan  and got precious ones through travel. Above I mentioned, reading a fiction make an good effect on the power of imagination  in our life. 

Next, reading a fiction is a good way to take a rest and get out of stresses. With a developing industry and tight schedule of our modern life, we are having a trouble with stresses which make us so tired physically and mentally , even which induce the disease  like  cancer. By using spare time, when we read fiction, we can relax us without a pill of tranquilizer and get out of stresses effectively. To illustrate, while I worked hard in graduate school due to a heavy burden of a national research project, I am in bad condition both mentally and physically, even while a mere trifle irritate me. I start to read novel “The Lord Of The rings” for a solution to get rid of my problem. It results in a good success. Even though tough research project and tight schedule, I can have a tranquil heart without stresses. Under mental stresses, sitting on the bench, let’s read an exciting novel, and then you feel free, comfortable. 

In sum up, for the above-mentioned reasons, I support the idea that reading a fiction is beneficial for enhancing the power of the imagination and a good rest and the removal of our stresses. On top of that, we can say that these benefits from reading a fiction are priceless.

column1: Schools should ask students to evaluate their teachers. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.

But as the time goes on and on, Viewpoint of the education is changing. Now, we can say and I agree with the above statement , ”Schools should ask students evaluate their teachers.” In that evaluating their teachers improve their skills and the quality of the education through the competition and is a good way for school administrators to evaluate teachers efficiently. 


     In the first place , evaluating teachers improve their skills and the ability of the education through the competition. As you see, the profession like teacher is stable and there is few possibility to be dismissed , on the other hand they are apt to fall in the period of a lassitude. Because teachers also are human being, they could get lazy and difficult to control their first minds, back to basics.  To get rid of this kind of a lassitude, evalutation about teachers give them some sort of incentives which refill with a passion. Before it  was introduced, the atmosphere of the lecture room was changed into a big enthusiasm, so we can learn a lot. Finally, without being restricted from leftovers of  Confucianism and thinking twice, the introduction of  the system of evaluating teachers is beneficial to rational education to enhance their skills and quality of the education through the competition. 

     In the second place, it is a good way for school administrators to evaluate teachers efficiently. When the school administrators evaluate the achievement of teachers, so many factors are included to it. In my thinking, one of the most important factors is whether students are satisfied with the lecture of the teachers, which show us the ability and the quality of the teachers. For example , Korea Information and Communication University used this system four years ago. The teacher who  get the worst score of evaluation receive some penalty, In viewpoint of efficiency of the organization, they succeed in it. If glancing, evaluating other people might be seen to bad thing, but it could contain more positive effects. Therefore we call evaluating teachers as a good method for managing the school organization. I think there should be no exception in every organization . 


     To sum up , I take the review that evaluating teachers is necessary for improve their skills and the quality of the education through the competition and is the efficient method for school administrators to evaluate teachers. Furthermore the good quality  of  the  education system which we will get by evaluating teachers absoulutely contributes to the developments of korea

column1: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
What do you think of learning? There could be plenty of answers to this question. Some can say learning means aquiring some kind of knowledge, while others regard learning as being harmonious with friends, family and neighbers. In my view, learning is the process of establishing relation with ohters. In this sense, I think we can learn more by parents because parents know us better than any other teachers in the world. What's more, parents give us love and affection that is indispensible for us to make good relation with others. 

First, as is mentioned above, there is no teacher who knows children better than parents. This is because parents have spent most of their time with their children. Although it is difficult for parents to give their children specific knowledge, information or skill, the very fact that parents know their children very well make them the best teachers. For example, teachers have no way to find out what their students need before students ask teachers what they want or need, because there are many students and few teachers. In addition, teachers can not spend most of their time in taking care of just one student. On the contrary, parents can spend relatively much time to their children. Thus, by spending a lot of time with their children, they can easily find out what children want to do, what they feel, and which they like more. 

Secondly, there is powerful device that make parents the best teacher such as love. Although there are many good teachers in this world, who can love their students more that their own children? Plus, in most case, the relationship between teachers and students are over when students graduate from school. Without personal affection to certain students, keeping touch with them is not as easy as we think. On the contrary, parents, the best teacher who love their students keep in touching with children with great concern before they die. 

In sum, it is not easy for us to conclude that parents are the best teacher because they can not teach us proffesional knowledge. However, the fact that parents understand thier children better that teachers and they love their children make parents the best teachers in this world. In this sense, I strongly agree with that statement.

column1: Some people prefer to live in a small town, Others prefer to live in a big city. Which place would you prefer to live in? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3:
I had lived in a small town until in high school, after that, I has lived in a big city. So I could experience all advantages and disadvantage of a small town and a big city. When I was in a small town, I thouht a small town was better that a big ciry, but after I moved to a large city, I never imagine that I return a tiny community. 
   
     Initially, in a large city, people could have many cultural opportunities more easily. For example, a few weeks ago, I and my friend living in a small town far from a large city went to the theater to watch very famous musical, 'Cats'. In my case, it took me about half of an hour to go to the theater by subway, but my friend spent almost 3 hours arriving in the theater by car because she lived in a tiny community. She exhausted valuable time in which she did something different and more money so that she drove a car operated with oil. In her small town, there were no theater for musical or play and many of the town were not interested them. So all she could do was that she went to a large city for seeing musical or play. If she had have born in a big community, she could have enjoyed musical and play as much as she wanted. 

     Next, much more medicine service is given to people living in a large city. Now I can imagine one documentary televised on TV last year. On documentary a story of one men preparing 'Disabled Olympic' was introduced. The men had blindness of one eye. According to his words, it originated from a unexpected accident. When he was a child, he and his friend played the game using a toy sword. The game was very exciting and they more and more fell into it. While they enjoying the game, the accident succenly occured. The sword of his friend stung his right eye deeply. He felt a extreme pain on his eye, and cried loudly. No sooner took him to the hospital in town than his mother saw his hurtten eye but doctor said that he should go to the bigger hospital in a big city. So He and his mother went to the hospital in a big city as soon as possible, but he lost his eyesight during going to there. Through this case, we can know why people prefer to live in a big city. 

     In conclusion, I prefer to live in a big city that living in a small town. Of course, living in a small town has the advantages ; clean air, pure water and stablility  earned from living with nature. However, when considering that I am young and health also now I need the advantages of cultural chances and medicine servise, it is obviousely much better for me that I live in a large city.

column1: It has been said, "Not everything that is learned is contained in books." Compare and contrast knowledge gained from experience with knowledge gained from books. In your opinion, which source is more important? Why?
column3:
People learn constantly from their birth to death. Not only school education or books but also things we see, hear, touch are good materials to get knowledge. Among them, I think knowledge of experience is more important than knowledge of books because of its durability, and it teaches us precious values like cooperation and flexibility. 
         
               First, we hardly forget what we learn from our own experience. For example, we learn importance of money and difficulty of earning money in capitalistic society by studying economics through books. Also, we memorize how money circulates between producer and consumer written in textbooks. However, we usually forget about it as time passes. On the other hand, we can learn hardship of gaining money or way of profiting in person through part-time job. The reason is that they are more practical, and as we learn it using five senses. In short, knowledge of experience are more important because it's unforgettable.   
        Secondly, knowledge of experience offers a sense of cooperation and flexibility which are important to build up one's character. Even if we can gain boundless knowledges studying books about astronomy, mathematics, and so on, it's no use if we bury ourselves in pedantic or impractical theory neglecting the value of cooperative spirit and flexibility, which can be gained by social experience like contacting directly with other people and various circumstances. To sum up, getting knowledge from experience is good to develop cooperative and flexible attitude.     
         
                In conclusion, if I have to choose between knowledge gained from experience and knowledge gained from books, I would choose the former. The reason is that it's lasts longer, and gives us cooperative and flexible mind. However, what we don't have to forget is that both knowledges of experience and books must be in balance.

column1: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television has destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3:
People have invented new machines and materials to make our life more convenient and joyful. Among them, television is one of the most effective inventions. In my opinion, I don't agree with the statement television has destroyed communication among friends and family because it gives people common subjects to talk about and time to get together.
         
              First of all, a family can have time to be with by watching television. These days, each individual is busy doing his/her own work and has different interest. However, after dinner, most family gather in the living room to watch TV. In my case, my family has talked about each others' daily life while watching television together. On the contrary, when my father puts the television away to prevent my eyesight from weakening, my family members did their own business in their own room. Shortly, television provides time to communicate with family.     

        Moreover, we can get some topics of conversation from television. There are lots of interesting and up-to-date informations that most people can share and enjoy. For example, a popular soup opera 'A lover of Paris' of SBS provided intimate and funny subjects to talk with friends. Also, television shows us about current issues so that we can discuss about it. In summary, whether that kind of topics are vulgar or not, it's certain that television helps people communicate with others by giving common interests and topics.     
         
                 In conclusion, I think television is serviceable stuff in the aspect of helping people communicate with their family and friends by giving chances and subjects to talk. Lastly, what I want to suggest is that people should control themselves to do not addict to watching television, and use it wisely to have better communication with others.

Some of them like to watch movies at home sitting on the sofa and some others want to watch them at a theater. As a mania for movies, I prefer the latter, which is the more attractive way to enjoy movies. 

Firstly, theater has a good environment to concentrate on movie. We can enjoy powerful sound and a big screen. Also the inside is dark enough. These are necessary if you want to enjoy the movie thoroughly. Although there are some equipment like home theater to provide similar environment to houses, because of the magnitude of the room the quality is much lower than the theater can offers.

The vacation is the opportunity for students to do something special they cannot experience in school. It is important to determine how long the vacation is more efficient for student to relax enough and prepare the next term and to learn the real life from parents and the real society behind school. I believe that long vacation each year can be more helpful for the student than several short vacations throughout the year. 

     First, they can do something sufficiently they cannot do during the school time when they have long vacation like learning sports or traveling. When I was freshman in university, I desired to travel European country with back and went around the country with great satisfaction during 2 months summer vacation. If there were only 1 month vacation, I may have not traveled fully and have regretted the lack of time. 

    Second, they can be taught from their parents during vacation, and the home education is as important as the school education. When the students have enough long vacation, they can spend more time with their parents besides their other activity. When I was high school student, I helped my mother’s house choirs and my father’s work during winter vacation for 3 months. Before that time, I thought that I was deserved to be taken care of by my parents. But, though the experience, I felt really how difficult was my parents working, and I realized truly I had to respect my parents. It was through my real experience in home that I recognized sincerely respecting my parents. Eventhough I always learned from the teacher that I had to have regard in high my parents. 

    In addition, it is necessary for the students to prepare the next term. If they have only short vacation, they cannot have enough time to learn the real experience which cannot be taught from the school and relax at the same time. During vacation, they have to have the time not only doing something they would like to do but relaxing to prepare the next term. If there is only short vacation, they will be too busy to finish the vacation good and get ready the new school semester. 

     In conclusion, I am firmly convinced that the long term vacation is essential each year for the students to try what they would like to do which they cannot do during the term and have the opportunity to be trained at home. In addition, through the long vacation, they can complete the vacation well and plan the next term.

column1: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? A person's childhood years (the time from birth to twelve years of age) are the most important years of a person's life. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
Almost people don't remember their childhood years; what they did, what they thought, and what happened. They were too young to remember everything. When we forgot the old memories, the only way to find out what happened before is to ask to our parents and our acquaintances who have known us since we were so young. our old memories are fading away even right now. Then, do the childhood years mean nothing? Absolutley not. 

        Firstly, the period that we got socialized is our childhood year. It means important. We learn the customs of the community which we belong to. That is, we learn who we are, what we have to, and what our society is. From learning things like this, we get a position of our society. And then, we can play our roles in the society. Through interaction with other people in the society, each of  us makes personality. It a part of the concept of socializaion. All these things happen in our childhood years. 

        Secondly, we get some tools needed for social activities. One of the most important thing is language. we have at least one language that is used our society, And, we speak our mother tongue. The era that we learn the language is also our childhood year. Moreover, we learn basic knowledge concerned science and mathematics in the elementary school, which is needed for the study and research that we are going to do. So, we have to take some tools like language and basic knowledge for our future. Unintentionally, and naturally, we learn those things in our childhood years. 

        Conclusively, if some person has bad time in the childhood years, his all life would be unhappy. It may not true, but he has more chance to be unhappy than normal people. It is because that something wrong in childhood years can influence to his life; bad socializazion or lack of knowledge. In short, childhood years can determine the whole life. So, the most important years of a person's life are the childhood years.

column1: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
There are a wide range of controversies about this statement that parents are the best teacher. Some people think that parents are the best teacher because they give their children many wisdoms of living which they experienced, and they well know their children any other in the world. Others say that parents do not become the best teacher for their children because they really love their children so they can not realize their mistakes, and they are not expert in all fields. However, I disagree that parents are the best teacher. 

  First, parents do not point out their children’s mistakes because they have love and attachment for them. They do not see their children with objective views, so they find their children’s mistakes as well as correct their faults. When I ate with my family, children run around the restaurant and made a noise as if it is their house. Although the children’s behaviors had bad influences on other people, their parents do not scold them and angry to people who scold their children. 

  Second, parents are not the best teacher because their knowledge does not cover all fields. Although they have various experiences and wisdom for living, they lack expert knowledge on diverse areas such as art, science, and history. Therefore, they could give their children an erroneous knowledge or information, so it may have negative effects on them. If your children ask you what you do not know, you can not give them the right answer. Consequently, your children are disappointed with you, and you might lose your authority as parents. 

  In conclusion, it is fact that parents play an important role in their children’s life. However, they are related their children so closely that they overlook their mistakes or faults. Although parents give us much love and consideration, I disagree with this statement for the reasons I have mentioned above.

column1: People do many different things to stay healthy. What do you do for good health? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
I think that health means not only physical health, but also mental health.  Thus, if we maintain our healthful condition, we should carefully concern both conditions in our life.  There are many kinds of activities to maintain both our mental health and physical health.  However, in my case, be in my case, I mainly prefer to exercise in inline-skating and jogging for keeping my physical health, and prefer to listen to music and watch movies for keeping my mental health. 

        To begin with, I mainly practice inline-skating and jogging for an hour every day. Both activities are good choice for maintaining my health, and they are also inexpensive sports.  If you decide to enjoy inline-skate or jogging, you should buy some equipment such as inline boots, repairing tools, body-protectors, and a helmet for inline-sports, or jogging shoes for jogging. It would require some money to buy these things. However, when you buy these equipments, you don't need to spend any more equipment.  For example, a golf club membership in Korea is very expensive. Average prices of the golf club membership are at least eight millions won, so most people in Korea who already have basic golf equipments could not play golf. Of course, the basic golf equipments in Korea are also more expensive than any other country. However, inline-skating and jogging are not expensive sports in Korea. It is also fun and you don't have to pay extra money for skating or jogging. Moreover, both activities are very good for our health. Many doctors say that both sports are good for strengthening respiratory organs and heart, and both also good for improving muscle system of our body. 

        In addition, to relieve mental stress, I prefer to listen to music and watch movies. I am one of the jazz fans and movie fans. When I am stressful, I often go to the movie, or borrow some DVD from DVD store around my home, or listen to jazz music. When I hear jazz music or watch movies, I can relieve my stress and feel comfortable. Actually, I believe that most people do same act like me, because when people listen to merry music or movies, they can alleviate their bad feelings. Moreover, most doctors and psychologists agree that the effects of music and movies can help alleviate one's stress and even cure some serious mental disease such as manic-depressive psychosis, and melancholia. 

        In brief, No one may deny that importance of maintaining physical and mental health is essential for our life, and I believe that Inline skating, jogging, enjoying music and movies are best choices to maintain my life in best way.

column1: Some people prefer to spend time with one or two close friends. Others choose to spend time with large number of friends. Compare the advantages of each choice. Which of these two ways of spending time do you prefer? Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3:
When we spend time with large number of friends, we get the chance to meet various kinds of people. This ables us to train social skill to easily adapt ourselves to different culture or taste. Also, gathering involving many people have a exciting atmosphere that can't be found in groups of small number of people. But I prefer to spend time with one or two close friends for the following reasons. 

  Firstly, spending time with small number of friends provides the comfort and intimacy that gathering of many people might lack. We often feel distressed from the overloaded work and become annoyed with so many people making noises in the restaurant. The comfort and intimacy we get from the gatherings of small number of people might relax our fatigue. 

  Secondly, during the time spending with one or two close friends, we can talk about serious matters and share useful information. Such serious problems seem hard to be shared among large number of people. Talking about problems with one or two close friends might be a good way to release the pressure of the problems. We might even realize the key to the next step of solving the problem. 

  Although there are a lot of advantages in spending time with many friends, I think the advantages of meeting one or two close friends overweigh them. And that is why I prefer to spend time with small number of friends.

column1: Is the ability to read and write more important today than in the past? Why or why not?
column3:
Recently, our society is getting more and more complex and developed. There are so many attractive matters that we can see, hear and feel that it is easy for us to believe that reading and writing are not important as ever before. However, as far as I know, reading and writing are basic and fundamental tools for expressing oneself and understanding others because they help us arrange one's thought. In addition, as before, the most important way to give others information is not TV show or radio talk show, but reading materials such as journal or books. Thus, I think reading and writing are more important, and here are some reasons for my decision. 

First, it is usually helpful for us to write down what we think or imagine. This is because we can not wirte about something without considering and re-arranging one's idea. For example, every time I prepare test, without re-arranging class note, I could not make a good resualt. It seems that while I try to write down what I read form my class note, text book or some kind of material, the process of writing helps me establish heirachy of knowledge, which make it easy for me to memorize or understand information. 

Second, although seeing, hearing and feeling are important tools of understanding complex and huge amount of information, reading and writng are also important to transper one's knowledge or thought to others. This is because such media as TV, radio and movie can not be easily and deeply understood because we can not memorize or understand them relativly short period time. We can read or write until we fully understand or express. However, due to its speed and duration, it is hard for us to concentrate on that matter. 

In sum, althogh traditional way of understanding and expressing, reading and writing, seems somewhat outdated, they are fundamental and crucial tools of interacting with others. Think of the world without no chance to read or write. How can you express or understand your own or others' knowledge, information, feeling and so forth?

column1: Smoking should not be permitted in restaurants, and laws that prohibit it should be upheld.
column3:
Smoking in restaurants is a selfish and disrespectful action for other people who came to the restaurant to enjoy their meal. There must be some people who dislike the smell of smoking so much that they can not have a meal with the smell of smoking. Also, it would disturb the people, who are trying to quit smoking. 

Moreover, as we all know, smoking affects second hand smokers in more harmful way than those who actually smokes. Because the restaurant is a place to enjoy a healthy meal, they are expected to be the places in a cleaner and better condition. It is obvious that no one likes to have a meal with the full of smoking. 

As a matter of fact, it is also very harmful and unhealthy for the smokers to eat their meal while they are smoking. By restricting the laws that prohibit people to smoke in the public area, the government or state leister can expect a less number of people who smokes, to keep a society and citizens away from bad influences and effects and also to help smokers quit smoking more conveniently. 

Not only a restaurant, but also other public buildings should not allow people smoking, and more importantly, smokers should realize that their actions of smoking where other people are, is irresponsible therefore should feel ashamed and guilty.

column1: It is better for children to grow up in the countryside than in a big city. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to develop your essay.
column3:
I agree that it is good for children to grow up in the countryside that give many good points. Although people know that the nature is the best textbook for children, they cannot give it to them for many reasons. The good points which can could gain from raising children in the countryside are the life in the natural which give a rest and a health, the friends who have a intimate friendship, and the best educational experiences which can not imagine in the city. 

The children in the city are dependent and weak even in mental. However, the children in the countryside are independent in whatever they do and strong in not only physical but also mental. While the children in the city are surrounded by bad air, various accidents in daily life and many dangerous things, the children in the countryside can have a nice day with a fresh air, a beautiful natural and a peaceful mind. 

The friendship in the city’s children is changeable and beatable by trivial reasons. For the children in the city can have many various friends as like videogame which can be exchanged when they disgust it, they could not make a real and deep relationship with their friends. In the countryside, for the children have not sufficient toys as city’s children, they have to have perseverance and a faith to make a friend. The friendship which be formed by this course is strong and would be sustained for a long time. 

While the children in the city have knowledge which learn from a textbook or an Internet, the children in the countryside can have knowledge from a real experience, which cannot do, in the city. The city’s children have only fast and useless knowledge, however the countryside’s children can have a live and real knowledge by their experience with the natural and self-stimulation. 

In conclusion, Although I have a difficulty in making a decision to raise children in the countryside for job and relationships with colleagues who I have known for long time, if I have a chance and make up a mind resolutely, many good things would be returns for children and also me; the children could obtain a health, an intimate friendship and a best educational environment in the countryside.

column1: Your school has enough money to purchase either computers for students or books for the library. Which should your school choose to buy computers or books?  Use specific reasons and examples to support your recommendation.
column3:
I think that both to buy books and computers have some advantages and disadvantages. If my school has a plan to buy something for the school library between books and computers, I would suggest to buy computers for the library, because computers are effective and convenient equipments for most students in terms of accessing up-to-date information, processing information quickly, and utilizing many kinds of school works. 

        First of all, students who work with computers can access up-to-date information. For example, our university library already has a wide variety of books, but most books only contain out-of-date information. Thus, students without computers hardly catch up with up-to-date technologies. Of course, students can ask a librarian to apply some books, which students need, but the process is mostly complex and time-consuming. However, if students can use a computer, these inconvenient things would be solved by computers, because students using computers can easily connect a school network system and Internet, and they can easily find information, which they need. 

        Secondly, students who work with computers can process much information in real time. For instance, if you want to find some books without computers in the library, you would spend a lot of time to find an index card, and to know that the book is still there or lended.  Maybe to find a book would take at least ten minutes without help of the computer. However, if you use a computer, you can direct search the book that you need, and you can get the book in no time. Of course, if you use Internet, you can also find a wide variety of information such as research papers, latest articles, and news in no time. Thus, students with computers can access information more quickly than students without computers. 

        Lastly, computers can be used in a wide variety of school works. For example, now, nowadays students use computers for research and word processing needs. Some teachers use computers for providing their course homework and information.  Moreover, many universities in Korea require students to learn computer, because the process of application of the course are completely computerized. My university also has computerized enrolling system. If the university buys many computers, students who don’t have a computer would be easily enrolled in the course, which they want. 

        In conclusions, I strongly believe that computers would be best choice to greatly improve the environment of the library. Even though books are simple to read, and they do not need such knowledge of the computer, I am sure that quickness-ability, access-ability, and wide application-ability of the computer are more valuable than books.

column1: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? People should read only those books that are about real events, real people, and established facts. Use specific reasons and details to support your opinion.
column3:

Simultaneously, the contents of the books should be different to each other. I am for sure it is good to have plenty of thoughts and philosophies in the world so that we can share them. Therefore, I am for the statement that people need to read both fiction and non-fiction for a couple of reasons. It will be viewed from following two aspects. 

  Firstly, one of the critical reasons why people should read both books about real events and unreal events is that we can learn to know what other people are thinking by reading the both kinds of books. The thoughts of other people could be about real phenomena or creative ideas. For example, had it not been for the novel of Aldous L. Huxley, Brave New World, we couldn't even have a chance to imagine how tragic the world would be if the science technology had been developed without conscience. That we have many a good novels, which stimulates our imagination, is very adorable in this mechanical and highly standardized society.

column1: Many people visit museums when they travel to new places. Why do you think people visit museums?
column3:
When you travel to new place, where is the first place that you want to visit? Answer to this question depend on the characteristics of site. If you are in the area that is famous for beautiful beach, your first trip is possibly the beach. Then, what could be your first stop, if there is no such famous place that attracts you? In my case, generally I take museum as the first stop for my visit because I can understand that area easily, fast and effectively. In addition, museum gives me unforgettable memories. 

First, the most fast and easy way to understand a certain area is to visit museum. We can learn brief history of that area by seeing historical stuff displayed at the museum. What's more, we can find out how that area's economic and cultural status is. In most case, if a certain local government is not in good cultural or economic state, the government tend not to invest on such faculties such as museum. It is because, to them, there are many things they have to invest first. On the contrary, if the local government and that area is flourishing, it is clear that they cherish their historical stuff. 

In addition, we can make some memories about certain place by visiting museum. We can see valuable historical remains that can not be seen at the other area. Furthermore, considering that museum plays an important role of being landmark of the area, we can experience fantastic building and landscape. For example, when I visit " the Louvre", what makes me exciting is not only its stuff, but also its building including glass pyramid. If I toured the city without visiting that museum, half of my memories could be lost in my mind. 

In sum, although visiting museum might seem to be somewhat boring, it is quite a useful way of understanding certain area. Museum is abstract of the area's history, culture and life. Without visiting local museum, how can you say that you visit and learn lots of things on that area?

column1: English as an official language.
column3:
Korea achieved brilliant success last 30 years. This miracle was come from perspiration of all people in Korea, especially the laborer who worked at the factory paying low-wage and poor environment. As economy grows rapidly, people concern about whether Korea can become more affluent or not. In Korea’s circumstance where natural resources are limited, talented people need to be trained. With part of that worries, some people urge to use English as an official language. It is inevitable to Korea to survive from globalization which accelerates competitiveness among the nations. How ever, in my opinion, finding our national characteristics is more important than following advanced nations recklessly. 

One of the biggest concerns is that we could lose our emotion of nation. We have more than 2,000 years of history and always proud of our nation. In 2002 World Cup, for instance, Korea showed intensive nationalism throughout the world. We all dressed red shirts and proud of what we made. Another example of our self-esteem is ‘Han-Gul’ which is Korea’s official language. Han-Gul is the perfect language that expresses every human feelings in words and also write every language that people use all over the world. It is a creditable invention that the world language experts acclaimed it. 

In addition, imagine of how impractical of using English in Korea society. How do you going to write Korean’s peculiar thinking? As an example of Korean novel, there are good novels in Korea which could not award novel prize at literature, because Han-Gul could not interpret properly. 

In conclusion, Using English as an official language does not mean fostering national competitiveness. Korea government should devise other alternatives that increase national benefits such as improving educational surroundings or lessening restrict policy to companies so that they can help domestic consumption. Also, People should conserve their cultures and prepare for the globalization. If not, we could be a cultural colony of other advanced nations.

column1: Some people prefer to eat at food stands or restaurants.  Other people prefer to prepare and eat food at home. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3:
As many people are becoming busy with their jobs,hobbies, they tend to go out and eat food from restaurants or fast-food store. They like those place because thay can save time and don't have to worry making food. Despite opposition from many, I prefer to eat food at home. 

First of all, I am able to save a lot of money. Because I'm student, I am not able to afford food price at restaurants 30 days a month and 12 months a year. It was  always my parents who gave a pocket money to me. I realized that the older we are , the more difficult we get a money from parents. I saw one article in newspaper that government and private companies spent two billion won to recover the environment. I also want to mention about tip culture. It’s recommended to leave 10~15% of your whole food price on the desk, when you leave the restaurant. If the waiter impressively served to you, you would like to leave more money than regular tips. 

  Secondly, eating at home is more safe than restaurant, or food stall. Generally speaking, most restaurants more interest money than any other things. One broadcaster reported the news that most of the fast-food store’s sanitations are terrible. A  worker said that a host just always has pushed him to work quickly and didn’t say anything about safty of making food. As you can see, your mother always tries to make healthy food for family members. Whenever she was about to buy some ingredients, she looked carefully about the expiration and the condition of food not the price of that. As a result, Family members are able to feel mother’s love. 

Thirdly, family members can share the feeling of membership. We are so busy with our own businesses that we are no longer interested with  the lives of our near and dear ones.  So I think  that the best way to solve this problem is to make a custom about eating at home at least one time a day. I am sure that they will feel the safety and comfort  each other. 

As we have seen above, there are many benefits eating food at home. It’s not only good to your health, but also good to relationship of family members.

column1: It is sometimes said that borrowing money from a friend can harm or damage friendship. Do you agree? Why or why not? Use specific examples to explain your answer.
column3:
There is an argument regarding the issue that lending or borrowing money from a friend can damage the friendship. Some people maintain that this behavior don’t affect friendship. However, in my opinion, borrowing money from my friends can affect negatively our friendship because this can damage my friend’s financial statement and might break confidence between friends. 
    First of all, if a person borrow some money from his or her fiend, it can give trouble to the friend because of the financial problem. For example, I am a university student and I earned money by doing part-time job to afford my tuition. In this case, I always have trouble in my financial statement. Two months ago, one of my friends answered me to lend one hundred dollars and I lent the money despite my condition for my friend and consequently I got in financial trouble. Hence, through the experience, I learned that borrowing money from a friend can damage the friendship. 
    Moreover, borrowing money can attack the confidence between friends. If a friend who borrowed some money don’t pay back the money, people might think that the friend doesn’t consider them. According to the research done by the Seoul National University in Korea, people feel sorry when their friends don’t do thoughtfully. To make the matter worse, once the truth is broken between friends, the relation can’t maintain as before. After all, friends break up the relationship each other. Therefore, I think that borrowing money can harm the relationship between friends.   
     In conclusion, I agree the statement that borrowing money from a friend can affect negatively friendship. This is because of the reasons mentioned above that borrowing can affect directly the financial statement of a friend and might reduce the belief between friends. We should make an effort not to borrow money from friends to keep the friendship.

column1: Holidays honor people or events. If you could create a new holiday, what person or event would it honor and how would you want people to celebrate it? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.

column1: Some people believe that students should be given one long vacation each year. Others believe that students should have several short vacations throughout the year. Which viewpoint do you agree with?
column3:
What would you do during vacation if you were to come back to school days? People have different ideas depending on their situations. I believe that one long vacation, not several short vacations, should be given to students because one long vacation can give time to build up work experience, time to travel and time to study their subjects. 

    First, students can have an opportunity to work as an intern during long vacations. By doing so, they can apply what they learn at school to a real working situation. If you are majoring in advertising, then you can work at advertising firm, such as LG Ad (well-known advertising company in Korea), as a creative designer, and really involve in making advertisements. I also had worked as an intern at a consulting firm during my vacation in my junior year and it was really a great time. 

    Secondly, one long vacation is good for students to travel around to the places they want to know more. As you may know, when you work with a company, you cannot have your time for a travel. In Korea, workers can take a trip for 7 days to at most 10 days in a consecutive. On the contrary, students can make the best use of their vacation to visit cities abroad. If you are interested in making movies, I strongly recommend you look around MGM studio and Universial studio where you can find how the movies are made.  During my freshman, I had a good chance to go to America. At that time, I visited the Ivy League School, for example Harvard University, Yale University and Princetone University and so on. I could see the beautiful campuses and also could talk with students there about their school life. 

    Finally, students can review what they learnt during their previous semester and make up for what they missed. In addition, students can work in advance what they want to study and prepare for the next semester. One friend of mine took a summer course to make up for what she failed at a freshman year, and eventually she could raise up her graduate point average to the level she wanted. 

     In short, I agree with the statement that one long vacation would be good for students because students can have working experience, visit countries they want and study what they learnt and prepare for the next semester during that time.

column1: Many people have a close relationship with their pets. These people treat their birds, cats, or other animals as members of their family. In your opinion, are such relationships good? Why or why not? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.

        To begin with, close relationships with their pets can help some people having serious mental disease to alleviate it, because when they spend their time with their pets, they can feel more comfort than before. For these reasons, some people spend their time to meet other people, or more concentrate their jobs. However, the most popular way to overcome loneliness is buying a pet such as a dog and cat.

column1: Teachers should not make their social or political views known to students in the classroom.
column3:
At the same time as the advancement of the society, the argument as to the scope of a right for teachers to express their political viewpoints in classroom has taken place. Regarding this, some people are advocating that teacher is able to show their opinion on political issues during classes. However, I am of the strong belief that the opposite is right due to its power to distort the class and the student's susceptibilty  to the teacher.
 
The first reason which is exceptionally evident is that political view in class could distort the contents of the academic subjects such as ethics, history, and so on. To be specific, if the teacher gives a lecture about some social issues or literatures adding his or her own political meaning, the students are likely to accept academics in a biased position. From my persnoal experience, my history teacher in high school usually taught us a few important historic events from the progressive viewpoints. Because of this, we used to think that our society should be drastically changed in most fields without rational reasons. In this regard, teaching with political stances would have a negative impact on the growth of the youth's mind.
 
Another equally important reason is that the student is very susceptible to teacher's thoughts. To elaborate, the students who are not mature enough to judge social or political phenomenon tend to follow teacher's opinion blindly, which can be an obstacle to the development of democracy in our state. According to a study conducted on the politics of adult by the Korea University, it has been reported that nearly 55% of the adults who are now a member of political parties responded that their politics have been significantly influenced by the teacher's political view in classes. As can be seen, it is obvious that teacher's social or political thoughts could affect students.
 
To wap it up, admittedly teachers have the rights to hold and mention their opinion on social or political things. However, looking at all statements above, if in the classroom, it is undeniable that its negative effects outweigh the favorable outcome of it.

column1: “In difficult situation, the teacher who give me hope and dream”
column3:
When I was the third grade of high school, I got an extra-curricular English teacher. And I worked harder, but it was not able to pick up my English grade.
 
I failed to get into the college and then I had to repeat college entrance exam. I went to my parents and I said “ Dad! Mom! I will take up the challenge of retaking the entrance examination! ” and then my mom and dad had no say and there was silence in the room. I expected a positive answer. But my parents said that “Young Suk, It is not a good idea, we can’t agree with your opinion. If you would repeat college entrance examination, It is not guaranteed to improve grade for 1 year.“ this answer did not satisfy me.  My parent‘s character is realistic and skeptical. Sometime it hurts me.
 
After I seriously struggled with the matter, I decided to try to repeat college entrance examination through self-teaching myself, despite of the objections of my parents. I told my parent about my plan. My parents did not say anything.  I was to study the reading room near my house. I went there with pack lunches, because I did not have money. I studied alone except for English. I had courage to call my extra-curricular teacher who taught me before and I called. At that instant, the telephone was trembled as my heart. Though the receiver, I said “Teacher ! I am Young Suk. I decided to study for college entrance examination again. But, it is difficult to study English alone . Can you help me? Actually I don’t have any money but If you help me, I will repay for your favor!!”  Centainly it was rude request to teacher. I felt shame and nervous . But I had  little hope.  Surprisingly, the teacher’s response was favorable. Teacher said that “ Are you trying again examination for college entrance? Oh I feel sorry. Okay let try again with me! After 10 minutes, can I meet you at McDonalds on the Academic streets?” I was very surprised and I replied loudly “Yes, I can!!” After a while, I went to McDonald on the Academic streets. Even my teacher arrived faster than me. I opened the door with a heart pounding. I greeted gladly teacher. “Hello! Teacher!!! It is been a long time. Nice to meet you” my teacher was reading the English newspaper and said “ Hi ! Young Suk!! “
 
We were going to have one study meeting per week, because he was a postgraduate student at that time. I thanked him a lot. Thanks him, I felt that I could pass the examination right now. After we ended our talking, we walked on the Academic streets. When I walked alone on the Academic streets, I always felt lonely. However, today, thanks to the teacher walking with me, I felt better and more confident than ever before.
 
 The teacher always taught me English thoroughly and efficiently. And when I asked something about English he always taught kindly like an older brother. Once, I could not remember a certain word exactly. I tried remembering the word exactly. However, I was not able to remember the word. Eventually, I sent the clues about the word the teacher. And then after a while, he sent the exact word. The teacher was so nice to me. I appreciated a lot of the teacher and I decided that “I will repay for his kindness and I should be the man like him”
 
He majored in Economics at the University. When he had to decide, he always thought rationally. When he bought products, after comparing product’s price and function thoroughly, he decided to buy. Once, we went to market to buy Coke. After he compared bottle Coke’s price, quantity and can Coke’s price, quantity, he said “Both price were same.” And then he picked up the can Coke. I was wondering and I asked “Many people like the bottle Coke. But why do you choose the can Coke?” And he replied “Both Coke’s price is same. The bottle Coke easily exit the bubble, while the can Coke do not get out of the bubble easily. And he said “Many people buy products without price comparison. Young Suk, when you buy a product, it is not wise to buy without price comparison. It is the theory of the price comparison in Economics.” After that, when he purchased products, he liked mathematical calculations. He was so nice to me and he was very rational person
 
He sometime taught me the theory of Economics and introduce that Economics is how useful in everyday life. He looked like so smart through my eyes. At that moment, I thought that “I should be the man who is smart and kind like my teacher. And I will major in Economics!“ and As I told him that I will major in Economics, he really was pleased and encouraged me “ Young Suk, I am sure that You will be the best Economics student !” He always encouraged me.    
 
Our class was continued in September. Although from September to November, I had to study alone, I did not feel lonely or fear. Instead of that, I felt confident. In November, I applied for the Korea SAT. And then I received my report card. At the instant, I could not stop talkin. My grade was improved especially in English! I decided to apply for Economics at University. My parents seriously worried that about my applying because It was difficult to admission to Economics. However, this time, my parent believed me. My admission was not guaranteed. The day of the announcemen, I tried to check my result with trembling heart. As the result, I got a admission in Economics! I was very happy. That night, my family enjoyed the party. And I reminded my teacher.
 
 After my admission, I could not reach him because he went to U.S.A. at the university first day,
 I thought that “I should be the wise man like the teacher as well as the man who help another people.”

column1: Reading books is a more satisfying pastime than watching movies.
column3:
Some people might argue that watching TV is a more useful hobby than reading books. It is because people can get rid of stress when they watch TV. However, I believe that reading books is a more fulfilling hobby for two reasons. First, people can broaden their views. Second, reading books improves work efficiency.
 
First of all, reading books can allow people to broaden their horizon. By reading a lot of books, they can learn about different worlds of lifestyles, basic customs and cultures. It is obvious that they may go through trial and error. However, they can learn to embrace diversity through this experience. For example, when I had a part-time job, there was an Ethiopian girl who brought home-cooked meals for lunch. She ate with her hands without using utensils, and other students who had never seen such a scene kept their distances from her. On the other hand, being educated on Africa and African table manners through various books, I was perfectly understanding and comfortable with what was taking place.
 
In addition, reading books can encourage people to work with more passion. This is attributed the fact that it can serve as one of the key motivators for them to perform better and to improve themselves. With such motivation, they put in more effort, concentrate better on their tasks, and feel a greater sense of responsibility for their work. According to a research conducted by the Ministry of Labor in 2009, there was a huge difference between two groups of employees in relation to their achievement. Employees in Group A who regularly read books and those in Group B did not. The researchers showed that the former group spent 25% more number of hours on working and performed higher than the latter group. In particular, the employees in Group A followed instructions, submitted assignments on time, and participated actively in group meetings. On the other hand, those in Group B dozed off and lacked focus while working. It can be inferred that reading books frequently has a direct correlation with the amount of effort and energy that employees invest in working.
 
All in all, the importance of my view cannot be underestimated by the fact that it can kill two birds with one stone for the reasons I have mentioned above.

column1:
Do you agree or disagree?
Universities should spend as much money on sports as they do on libraries.

Some argue that university is designed for academic reasons only. Advocates of this argument would resist the idea of university expanding budgets for promotion of physical activities. However, I believe that physical health which is promoted by sports activities lead to better academic performance and triggers healthy social network and relationship with one another.

Good physical condition which leads to excellent academic performance is well-proved concept through many studies. One research revealed that students who worked out regularly had much better academic performance by 20% than those students who didn't. The study further explained that physical activities lubricates the brain to function in perfect condition, making it in perfect condition to study better. This is why universities should not underestimate the effect of investing money on sports activities. Therefore, universities should provide proper environment for students to exercise on regular basis by putting much money and effort on sports.

Not only sports activities promote physical condition which eventually affect positively on academic performance, it also triggers healthy interaction between students. Most sports games such as soccer and football are designed to play in group. Thus, while playing with many people, students naturally interact with each other and easily make friends. For example, football season was the one of the best time in my college life, as it was good opportunity for me to hang out with friends and meet new people. Bunch of friends went to the football stadium and watch the game cheering our team together. It was a chance to get closer to friends I have, and build new friendship.

To sum up, universities should put enough money to provide adequate environment for students to work out. This is as important as investing money on library since physical health is relevant to better academic performance and sports offer students to socialize. In this regard, I completely agree with the statement.

In addition, as they visit many other countries, it can make them to improve their perspectives greatly and help them to reduce their mental stress from work. For example, since a friend of mine works on his own business, he can manage his leisure time well as he wants. So, he have visited many other countries, which as a result it allows him to better understand other cultures, perspectives, and to meet a lot of new people from other countries. These experiences really help him to broaden his social network and to be successful in his business. Through this experience, I strongly believe that spending three days a week has more positive effect on people.

second, going to workplaces for five days a week really makes people tired and to get stressed. In modern society, most people have their own cars and there are scores of transportation such as buses or taxies. So, it can be frequently seen that traffic jams during rush hours, which as a result causes people to get stressed. Stress is the main cause of diseases, short life span, and dissatisfying life. Therefore, working five days a week have negative effect on people`s lives. According to the study done by New York Times, it revealed that the most contributing factor to make workers to get stressed was a traffic jam during rush hours. They also answered that staying at their own cars or buses for long times on the road made them really tired. Through this study, it is clearly proved to me that working five days a week is much beneficial.

column1: These days, decreasing birth rate is a serious crisis in Korea and other rich countries. The problem is expected to greatly damage the countries’ economies. What are the ways we can solve this matter? Use specific details to support your answer.
column3:
Decreasing birth rate is similar as an arrow. It’s affecting our country so badly. Due to the decreasing number of newborn babies, a big portion of Korea’s citizens is aged 65 and older. This matter can damage our economy badly because the country should invest a lot of money on taking care of retired seniors. Also, since there aren’t enough babies being given birth, Korea cannot raise new workers of the future. Isn’t there any way we can escape from this situation?
 
 The first thing we can do to solve problems related to the low birth rate is to encourage mothers and fathers to give birth to more children. The biggest reason why parents aren’t having children is because of the amount of money they should spend to raise them. (education fees, money to buy their clothes, etc.) The money spent to raise a child is impossible to be calculated, and parents are concerned if they would face hardships in managing their budgets. In this situation, the government can support them in spending money for their kids. Currently, the government of the Republic of Korea is funding fees spent for a third child in a family. Our country needs to come up with more ideas like this one in order to attract mothers to help increase the birth rate.
 
 The second solution is to let citizens know more about the seriousness of the decreasing birth rate. A lot of parents in Korea aren’t aware of the reasons why low birth rate is such a serious crisis. They don’t know that when a big number of citizens become 65 and older, our nation’s economic growth can slow down because we cannot raise enough workers for companies, and the government needs to spend a big part of people’s taxes for healthcare and retirement life of seniors. In this situation, we can write more news articles and books about the birth rate issue. Then, people who read these would be able to learn how serious the problem is.
 
 Low birth rate is a serious problem in our nation these days, and we have to come up with solutions to it. We can encourage parents to have more children, and write books and show news broadcasts about the issue in order to let the public realize that it is a huge matter. Personally, I think one of the reasons why it is hard to increase the birth rate is because not every citizen of our country is participating in coming up with solutions. It wouldn’t be hard to solve the crisis if all of us help bring our birth rate back to normal. Come on! Think of an idea! There isn’t anything impossible!

column1: TV programs and movies are obliged to show that good people are rewarded and bad people are punished. Do you agree or disagree?
column3:
Some argue that TV programs or movies we watch should be free from any restriction society puts, giving total allowance to express director/artist’s view. However, in my opinion, TV programs should have some extent of obligation to include common moral value or decency to protect young viewers. Further, these video images affect our view on society both consciously and unconsciously.

TV program producers or movie director should consider moral value in their creation because it affects young viewers’ behavior. It is well-known fact that children have tendency to imitate adults’ behavior. It is also applicable truth when they watch TV programs or movies. Especially, many TV programs and movies star celebrities which young people idolize. If such video images contain morally vague concepts, it would affect the youth negatively due to their tendency to emulate role models. Furthermore, the young tends to be less concrete about their morality, not knowing what is good or bad, and have vulnerable mentality. In this case, exposing them to morally ambiguous images damage their morality severely.
 
On top of that, these morally ambiguous images, which bad people get rewarded and good people get punished for example, would not only affect the young but also provoke adults. Visual images have tremendous impact on people. To elaborate, when exposed to these images without knowing it, it would unconsciously have effect on people. One study revealed that a person who watched violent movies have higher tendency to display violent behavior than that who did not. Therefore, putting images such as good people getting punished instead of bad people would damage people’s faith that good deeds result in luck and reward. If such belief continued among people, it would bring serious moral hazard to the society as a whole.

In conclusion, creators of visual images on screen are obliged to contain morally accepted consequence in the story they produce to protect both the young and old.

column1: A nation should require all of its students to study the same curriculum until they enter college
column3:
The different viewpoint on how to educate students has been a lingering question for all nations. Some argue that setting a fixed curriculum covering various subjects for all the students is more effective than adopting different curriculum for each one. However, in my opinion, opposite is right because each student has their own unique talent which cannot be same with others, and teaching the same curriculum lacks room for creativity.

As mentioned above, teaching the same curriculum for every highschooler is ridicule due to their unique talent of each and everyone. Some students might have artistic potential and others might be math prodigy. These two types of students cannot be taught in the same way. That is, a person who has better potential in art field would be better educated with classes of extended and deeper understanding of drawing or design, and math genius would be much more suited with classes with numbers and calculations. In this way, they can pursuit what they want to achieve in the future more effectively and successfully.

Another equally important reason is that teaching the same material to all the students discards the chance of creativity. Set out curriculum means all the study material is fixed-prepared for the students to be acquired. Thus, all students have to do is to memorize what they are taught. The tests will be given to measure students’ understanding of limited coverage of that study only. Therefore, there is not much room for the learners to perform their intellectual mind.

To wrap it up, all the students studying the same curriculum in high school is ineffective educational structure. Rather, government entity relevant to the education system should come up with better way to stimulate creativity and new ideas among endeavors and expand the room for them to play during the learning process.

column1: It is better for governments to spend their funds on the exploration of outer space than on earthly matters. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer. You’ll have thirty minutes to plan, write, and revise your essay.
column3:
There is no doubt that our planet Earth is highly contaminated these days. Due to the increased amount of greenhouse gasses being released into the atmosphere, our world is suffering from global warming and destruction of the ozon. In order to avoid this situation, many scientists are thinking of ways to find a planet everyone can migrate to when it becomes impossible to live on Earth. This is one of the reasons why people are investing a huge amount of money on outer space exploration. However, it sounds more ideal to spend governments’ funds to deal with earthly matters, not space exploration.
 
 To begin with, it isn’t easy to find a planet we can move to in the future. As I have mentioned above, planet Earth is greatly polluted nowadays. It is expected that in a few decades or so, it would be impossible to breathe in fresh air and drink clean water on our planet. Since they are too worried to face the future, people are in search for planets we can move to. However, it is very difficult to find our ideal planet. Until now, scientists weren’t able to find an appropriate planet for humans. Nearly every planet they discovered lacked water and air. Also, even though they have found an alternative home for people, it would take countless light years for us to get there. Instead of spending time and money on looking for a new planet, it would be easier to engage more in bringing our nature back to its original condition.
 
 Moreover, it is easier to find new resources on Earth than in outer space. Many people agree that one of the reasons why people are investing a lot of money on space exploration is because they want to find new materials there. Since we lack coals and other natural resources, a lot of countries think that they would be able to find alternative energies easily off Earth. However, I disagree with this. Even though we discover planets with rich minerals and energies, it still takes a lot of time and costs a lot for us to go there and bring those resources to Earth. It is better to think of more ways we can use nature (sunbeam, wind, water, etc.) to create new types of energy because it is much faster than space exploration.
 
  It is more ideal for governments to spend their funds on problems related to Earth, not ones about outer space. This is because it isn’t easy to find a planet to migrate to, and it is easier and faster to discover new energies on our planet than in space. I don’t mean that we shouldn’t have any curiosities about other planets and stars. I mean that we should care more about our planet Earth, which is suffering from global warming and other natural crisis. If we do so, we wouldn’t have to abandon the planet and move somewhere else.

column1: Universities should spend as much money on sports as they do on libraries.
column3:
